name: Opera House Fencing
description:
Opera House Fencing, is a game about a dramatic showdown on the backstage walkways of an Opera House. You fight with a saber in a simplified version of real fencing against your enemy, while enjoying epic classical tunes.

Updates & Bugfixes (Only on Postjam version.):

  • Made AI more aggressive.
  • The actors now can't overlap each-other and pass through.
  • Camera no longer clips through wall
  • Changed controls from W and S to A and D
  • Made main menu nicer (new font, controls guide appears with keypress)
